Tasks.Task Description: Identify the business requirements and objectives for the analytics project. Determine the data sources, expected outcomes, and key performance indicators (KPIs).

Tasks.Task: Assess Data Sources and Integration Needs
Tasks.Task Description: Evaluate the data sources to be ingested into Azure Synapse Analytics. Identify integration requirements for on-premises, cloud, or third-party data sources.
Plan the architecture of the Synapse workspace, including data lake integration, dedicated SQL pools, and serverless SQL pools. Define the structure for data storage and processing.
Create the Azure Synapse Analytics workspace in the Azure portal. Configure the workspace settings, including resource group, region, and networking options.
Configure data integration pipelines using Synapse Data Integration features. Define data ingestion, transformation, and loading processes.
Enable security features such as encryption, role-based access control (RBAC), and private endpoints. Configure firewall rules and data masking as needed.
Set up monitoring and alerting for the Synapse workspace using Azure Monitor and Synapse Studio. Define metrics and thresholds for performance and error tracking.
Create SQL queries, machine learning models, and other analytics workflows to process and analyze data. Optimize queries for performance and scalability.
Perform testing to ensure data pipelines, queries, and models are functioning as expected. Validate data accuracy and processing efficiency.
Analyze performance metrics and optimize the Synapse workspace for scalability. Adjust resource allocation and query execution plans as needed.
Create detailed documentation for the Synapse workspace architecture, data pipelines, security configurations, and analytics workflows.
Conduct training sessions for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the Synapse workspace and analytics processes.
Ensure the Synapse workspace adheres to compliance and governance standards. Implement auditing and reporting mechanisms for regulatory requirements.
